solution_line_template: First find the number of cups of banana mush Hannah gets: {total_bananas_used} bananas / {bananas_per_cup_mush} bananas/cup = <<{total_bananas_used}/{bananas_per_cup_mush}={cups_of_banana_mush}>>{cups_of_banana_mush} cups

Then multiply the number of cups of mush by the ratio of flour to mush to find the number of cups of flour: {cups_of_banana_mush} cups mush * {flour_per_cup_mush} cups flour/1 cup mush = <<{cups_of_banana_mush}*{flour_per_cup_mush}={cups_of_flour}>>{cups_of_flour} cups flour
